```
apiVersion: v1

kind: Pod

metadata:

 name: rest_service

spec:

 containers:

 name: rest_service

 image: rest_service

 ports:

 - containerPort: 8080

```

```
apiVersion: 1.0

kind: Deployment

metadata:

 name: rest_service-deployment

spec:

 replicas: 3

 template:

 metadata:

 labels:

 app: rest_service

 spec:

 containers:

 - name: rest_service

 image: rest_service

 ports:

 - containerPort: 8080

```
